target_name: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all
indicator_description: The total passengers that used the buses for various types of journeys in Bristol
computation_definitions: The total passengers that used the buses for various types of journeys in Bristol includes those hat use the park and rides and separately those passengers that started a journey in bristol.
computation_calculations: No calculations were performed on this datast and it was presented as found
